archimate:BusinessObject.name: GoldPackageSpec
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This class defines the Gold Service class, which provides traffic conditioning, access, and other sub-services to a set of applications that are assigned Gold Service. In this bundle, users of the GoldPackage get "better" service than users of the SilverPackage or BronzePackage.
Please see the DEN-ng Service model for more details.
